decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising the erection of a rear roof dormer extension would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations comprising the installation of two roof lights in the front roof slope with no protruding balcony or railings would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations comprising the installation of a soil  vent pipe would consist of any other alteration to the dwelling house within the meaning of Class G of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (Amendment) (No. 2) (England) Order 2008 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class G. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 4 - The applicant is advised that this certificate is issued on the basis that the front roof light windows are simply openable windows and that if there is any form of terrace or railings that protrude beyond the roof plane when a window opens then this would not fall within permitted development and planning permission would be required.
description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A REAR ROOF EXTENSION WITH INSTALLATION OF ROOFLIGHTS TO THE FRONT SLOPE.
